text: George Martin (born 1937 in Barcelona, Spain) is a Spanish director, producer, and movie actor. He is known for his roles in the Italian 3 Supermen series and for other parts in Spaghetti Westerns and Italian exploitation movies. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Barcelona Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Movie directors from Barcelona Category:Spanish movie producers Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Writers from Barcelona
title: George Martin (Spanish actor)
